description: This Kotlin source file defines the NoteViewModel class, which extends AndroidViewModel. It provides observable data (LiveData) and CRUD operations for Note objects, acting as a bridge between the repository layer and the UI in an Android application.

classes.name: NoteViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel exposing notes data and CRUD operations to the UI, encapsulating the logic for handling Note objects within the app.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a Note by its ID using the repository.

methods.name: getByIdOnce
methods.description: Retrieves a Note by its ID synchronously, blocking until the result is available.

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts a new Note using a coroutine launched in the ViewModel scope.
